ONBOARDING_MESSAGE: Welcome to Study Buddy! I'll ask you questions to help you build your Computer Science knowledge. I can ask about Data Structures, Algorithms, and Object Oriented Programming. What do you want to learn?
GENERIC_REPROMPT: Sorry, I didn't catch that. Do you want to learn about Data Structures, Algorithms, or Object Oriented Programming?
HELP_MESSAGE: Study Buddy helps you practice Computer Science concepts by asking you questions. I can ask about Data Structures, Algorithms, or Object Oriented Programming. You can also check your score at any time. What do you want to learn?
FALLBACK_MESSAGE: Hm, I'm not sure about that. Do you want to study Data Structures, Algorithms, or Object Oriented Programming?
EXIT_MESSAGE: Great studying today! See you next time!
ERROR_MESSAGE: Oh no, something went wrong. Try again later.
CONFIRM_QUIZ_TYPE: Great! Let's practice {quizType}! First question: <break time="300ms"/>
INCORRECT_ANSWER: Sorry, {response} is not correct. The correct answer is {answer}.
COMPLETED_QUIZ: You've completed all the {quizType} questions! Great work! See you next time.
